Html: Can talent points from rawr be transfered to my wow character directly? If so how do I go about it?  Thanks

I don't believe there is a way to export talent points. However there is a mod called Talented that allows you to import "templates directly from the Blizzard Talent calculator, wowhead or wowdb." So get a template set up in either one of those, install Talented. Go to your talent page (default keybound is to the letter "n") and it will bring up your talent sheet with all three trees showing at the same time. in the first drop-down click "import" and paste in the url that the template you created.

This mod also allows you to save templates that can be viewed on any alt you have.
